title: Bioaccumulation - more enters organism than leaves

content.question: Which of the following is the best description of bioaccumulation?

choices.label: The uptake of essential nutrients by plant roots
The absorption of a substance by an organism at a rate greater than the rate of elimination
The transfer of persistent pollutants like PCBs from one generation to the next
A process that occurs exclusively in marine ecosystems
A high mortality rate in organisms that have been exposed to a toxin

content.answer: The absorption of a substance by an organism at a rate greater than the rate of elimination
